title: Namaste: Honoring the Light in All Beings
itunes:title: Namaste: Honoring the Light in All Being
description: Namaste: Honoring the Light in All Beings - The ritual of Namaste - bowing to the sacred in ourselves and others - helps us live from the loving awareness that is our true nature. This talk looks at how we suffer because we forget this basic goodness, and explores the pathways of remembering that carry us home.
